name: iBugs Invasion FREE — Top & Best Game for All
name_original: iBugs Invasion FREE — Top & Best Game for All
description:
***** April's "What's Hot" selection in the Arcade and Action

***** Selected By Apple as "New & Noteworthy"

Alert: it’s a bugs invasion! They congest your house and threaten to capture the land. They are numerous and fast, so get your fingers ready! Kick the bugs!

Hold your iPad or iPhone and start the war against these creatures now!
Tap the screen to squash as many as you can before the time runs out.

GAME FEATURES:
- High quality graphics and sounds
- Realistic animations of all insects
- Random backgrounds
- GameCenter scores board

PLAY MODES:
- Single game
- Dual game - play with your friends *
- Easy mode - with slower movement *

BONUSES:
- Spray Can
- Extra Time *
- Bomb *
- Сircular Saw

* Available in Full Version.
